name: Elophar
description: The Elophar is a large undead creature with a distended stomach that emits corrosive ectoplasm when injured. It exhibits a chaotic and terrifying presence, alternating between various personalities during combat.
memorable: Its ability to randomly switch personalities makes it unpredictable and challenging to strategize against.
goals: To cause chaos and destruction in combat while using its spellcasting for tactical advantages.
relations: Can be related to other chaotic undead or spirits and may fight alongside other minions of evil.
environment: Often found in dark, chaotic areas or places of death and decay.
strengths: High hit points and ability to resist poison damage, along with spellcasting capabilities.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to ranged attacks, and its Wisdom score leaves it susceptible to mind-affecting spells.
attacks: Melee attack with slam causes significant bludgeoning damage, while abilities like Ectoplasmic Spray deal area damage.
most_powerful_ability: Ectoplasmic Spray creates a damaging area around itself when it takes any damage.
senses: The Elophar has darkvision with a range of 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim and dark environments.
additional_information: Ability to cast spells at will and multiple times a day.
Undergoes unpredictable personality changes each turn.
Immunities to poison damage and being poisoned.
Low passive perception indicating poor observation skills.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like acid splash, chill touch, and poison spray at will; also has grease and thunderwave available three times a day, and can enlarge/reduce once per day.
